com.opensource.bitmapfun.util

类 RetainFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.opensource.bitmapfun.util.RetainFragment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class RetainFragment
extends Fragment
    A simple non-UI Fragment that stores a single Object and is retained over configuration changes. In this sample it will be used to retain the ImageCache object.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 android.support.v4.app.Fragment

        public static RetainFragment findOrCreateRetainFragment(FragmentManager fm)
